title: Executive Order 11925-Promotion of Navy and Marine Corps Officers From Below the Appropriate Promotion Zone
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 5711(b) of Title 10 of the United States Code, and as President of the United States of America and Commander in Chief of the Armed Forces, Executive Order No. 11554 of August 29, 1970, as amended, is further amended by deleting "June 30, 1976" and inserting in lieu thereof "September 30, 1978".
citation: Gerald R. Ford, Executive Order 11925-Promotion of Navy and Marine Corps Officers From Below the Appropriate Promotion Zone Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/268628
